{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-MR11U |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL032PIF |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=battery |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} There are multiple revisions of this device. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-mr11u On the OpenWrt wiki]
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=150644#p150644 On the OpenWrt forums], [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=33530 and again]
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=36418 Header modifcation to get OpenWrt to flash on the MR11U v2] [http://bbs.mydigit.cn/read.php?tid=334500 Images on mydigit.cn] ==Images== File:Mr11u v2.jpg|TL-MR11U v2 [[Has images::external| ]] File:TL-MR11U 1.jpg|board top File:TL-MR11U 0.jpg|AR9331 closeup File:TL-MR11U 2.jpg|board bottom File:TL-MR11U 3.jpg|battery [[Has images::internal| ]]
